steps.title: Don EMU Suit
steps.instruction: Don the Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Verify all seals and connections are secure. Report suit pressure.

steps.title: Pre-Breathe Initiation
steps.instruction: Connect to the suit's oxygen supply and begin pre-breathing 100% oxygen. Start the 60-minute timer.

steps.title: Light Exercise
steps.instruction: Perform 10 minutes of light exercise on the cycle ergometer to increase nitrogen washout. Maintain a steady heart rate.

steps.title: System Check
steps.instruction: While pre-breathing, perform a full systems check of the EMU. Verify comms, life support, and battery levels are nominal.

steps.title: Airlock Depressurization
steps.instruction: Enter the airlock. Close and seal the inner hatch. Initiate airlock depressurization sequence.

steps.title: Final Go/No-Go Poll
steps.instruction: Confirm with mission control for final Go/No-Go for EVA. Await their confirmation before opening the outer hatch.
